name: FeedVid Live
description:
FeedVid Live is a short puzzle game taking place in an unusual livestreaming app. It's the sequel to FeedVid - the games can be played in any order as the stories are not directly related.

Content Warning: This game depicts mutilation (non-graphic), stalking, guns, and mental distress.

Note for YouTubers / Streamers: I recommend using the downloadable version for recording.
